video.title: Let’s Build a Tinder-Like Swipe Carousel
video.description:
Learn how to make a Tinder-like image carousel. We’ll be able to swipe images left or right on your computer or phone!

We’ll learn about the Pointer event APIs built into almost every browser to handle the swipe detection. We’ll also use CanJS to handle events and build a reusable component.

💻Code: https://codepen.io/chasenlehara/pen/pZOpRE

Talk given by Chasen Le Hara at the JavaScriptLA meetup.

Thanks to JavaScriptLA for giving us permission to post this talk. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: fade and braid
topLevelComment.text: The worse video ever by two over inflated egos. The website chasen le hara is void and code pen link doesn't work. Overall poor quality. If you want to learn JavaScript   see Adam Khoury and the coding school. If you want to learn about coding in general watch the tech lead ex Google programmer.

topLevelComment.text: Evil Tinder?  We just call it Tinder.
